campaign.story:
Strong, brave, probably a little more than slightly insane, the barbarian is the first tool in the arsenal of any self respecting megalomaniacal sorcerer hell bent to take over the world. Or in the warband of any ambitious Warlord seeking fame and fortune gold and glory!
Like walking piles of muscle held together by leather and chains and random plates of battered metal, the barbarian flings himself into the fray frothing at the mouth and shouting unintelligible obscenities. God knows they tend to die a lot so you'll need a lot of them.....so here we are!
Red Box Games makers of awesomely designed, exquisitely sculpted and expertly cast fine fantasy 28mm scale miniatures is very proud to present!!
WARBANDS OF WRATH AND RUIN
With your generous support we hope to fund the production of a series of new, finely detailed and beautifully sculpted, expertly produced," 28 mm " scale barbarian miniatures which are the initial warband starter set for an all new small scale skirmish game set in a brutal, fallen fantasy world ruled by capricious Living Gods and beset by the ravages of their eternal war for survival and supremacy. The rules for the game are not quite ready for print yet but it is the goal of this campaign to fund this initial set of figures which will help us to also afford to finish the rules and get the production process for the rules and game components started.
In the game, Players take on the role of a powerful characters of super human or preternatural nature called " Chosen " in command of a small band of followers of various role and ability. These warbands , referred to in game as the " Following " expand in number and diversity as the Warlord grows in Power, Repute, Fortune and Favor of the Gods beginning in number between 6 and 9 followers, but growing to include as many as 24 followers at the Apex of the Chosen's Stature.
FOLLOWERS
These followers may be lowly slaves, cultists, warriors, champions, and even monsters. But the core of any Chosen's following are the foot warriors.
FOOT WARRIORS
The foot warriors are the most basic type of warrior follower. They are sparely equipped and basically trained and able. They are non specific to the character of their Chosen and can be of many different races or creature types but the first set of Foot Warriors we want to fund are the Human foot warriors. Rippling muscle and ready to slay in the name of any Chosen whose coin can fill their bowl or whose stature warrants following. 
Pictured here still somewhat WIP these figures are semi modular for VERY expansive customization options and are cast in a very high quality lead free white metal. All modular fittings will be made in such a way as to insure easy secure assembly.
The items included in the pack are;
10 barbarian foot warrior head / helm options
6 right hand weapon options
3 heavy weapon options
3 heavy weapon foot warrior bodies
5 weapon and shield foot warrior bodies
All this in one set for $40.00!! High quality, finely detailed metal minis for $5.00 Each!
 SOLOS
Solos include both the companions and the Chosen themselves. These are the characters of the stories with the companions acting as a supporting role to the Chosen. Please note that any one of the foot warriors can be selected as a Solo option. 
PRIESTESS
The Priestess is a companion follower who serves as an intermediary between the Chosen and one of the Patron Gods of the world. Each Priestess is different and their uses can vary wildly based on the particular choices made during the creation of the character for use in the game but rest assured in this game a Chosen without some sort of spiritual aid is a Chosen set upon an arduous path.
Pictured here as a WIP the Priestess will be available in 2 different forms. One unclad and one half clad. The image above represents her unclad form. Her clad form will be slightly more modest.
Backers can add additional copies of the Priestess to their existing pledge for an additional $8 per copy desired.
Backers can also pledge for the Priestess figure ONLY if they so choose for $8 per copy desired.
LESSER CHOSEN
Currently still WIP the Chosen will be finished very soon!
The Chosen are the scions of the Gods. Born from any strata of denizen in the realms these few are half mortal and half God, able to draw upon the ethereal energies of the cosmos to fuel superhuman feats of strength, speed, skill or to perform miraculous manipulations of the world around them. They can be man or woman marked by the touch of divinity with strange colored skin, hair, eyes, super human, or inhuman build or feature.
 Backers can add additional copies of Chosen to their existing pledge for an additional $8 per copy desired.
 Backers can also pledge for the Chosen figure(s) ONLY if they so choose for $8 per copy desired.
PLEDGES
 As the funding allows I WILL add more options to the campaign. These will include Chosen of different nature to lead the Foot Warriors and companions of different role and nature to aid these Chosen in their quest for power, survival, glory, favor and fortune. I do not anticipate being able to add other foot warrior types to this campaign BUT I DO have plans for other various types of foot warrior to expand the range of theme of the game through future campaigns if this campaign does not reach a level of funding to allow them to be added during this campaign.
Backers are free to add as many sets of foot warrior as they desire. This is accomplished by simply managing the amount of their pledge upward by enough value to cover multiple sets.
STRETCH GOALS
It is our hope to be able to expand the total offering of this campaign to include Chosen and Companions of different character such as an Amazon, a Mutant, a Beast Man, and a Hoplite, as well as a Sorceror, Sorceress, Priestess and Mystic as well as different head options for the Human foot warriors, and possibly other foot warrior themes as well! We can only do this as funding allows however and we will need to cover the costs of each new addition BEFORE it is a selectable add-on or substitution.
PRODUCTION
We have been producing miniatures in metal and resin for a long time..... 10 years actually. And in that time we have established strong stable partnerships with some of the best contractors in the industry. This project will be handled by one of those awesome professionals as well insuring promptly delivered awesomeness so that you can get started playing your games while the excitement is still fresh! This contractor is VERY well established in the industry having delivered in a timely fashion to high levels of quality on several very large products including many of my own Kickstarter projects. Their system of manufacture is very well tested and efficient to make sure that delivery is handled swiftly. And being based in the US this means no lengthy delays in delivery, and no unexpected complications in that process.
SHIPPING
We will not accept any payment for postage through the kickstarter. So please be aware that all of the money you add to your pledge WILL be applied to a reward selection and NOT to the postage needed to cover the shipment of your rewards. I have learned the hard way several times that trying to predict the postage costs of rewards packages can very easily become a serious problem. 
You will be billed for postage during the pledge manager phase of fulfillment which will be very shortly before delivery commences. We work to keep the postage costs as low as possible and we will be certain that your rewards are securely packaged so as to avoid any damage in transit.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I have been working in the miniatures industry since 2006 and have been operating my own business producing miniatures since 2008. In that time I have produced several hundred different unique figures and shipped thousands of packages around the world. I have also established very close working relationships with several of the best contractors in the business.
There are always certain risks in any production but I feel that with my experience and relationships I can confidently say there is very minimal risk involved in this kickstarter due to the sheer amount of experience I have in making minis and the reliability and experience of my casting contractor. There may be certain fixes needed for optimal casting of the figures and there may be production delays as these fixes are made. If the project's scope grows beyond the initial offering it could also result in further delays as all fo the product is readied for delivery. The most reasonable risk I could assume worth being worries about would be a delay in postage or a sudden drastic increase in postage costs. An Increase in postage costs is VERY unlikely though as the time frame between funding and delivery on this project will be very short.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Backers are free to add as many sets of foot warrior as they desire. This is accomplished by simply managing the amount of their pledge upward by enough value to cover multiple sets.
STRETCH GOALS
It is our hope to be able to expand the total offering of this campaign to include Chosen and Companions of different character such as an Amazon, A Mutant, a Beast Man, and a Hoplite, as well as a Sorceror, Sorceress, Priestess and Mystic as well as different head options for the Human foot warriors, and possibly other foot warrior themes as well! We can only do this as funding allows however and we will need to cover the costs of each new addition BEFORE it is a selectable add-on or substitution.
PRODUCTION
We have been producing miniatures in metal and resin for a long time..... 10 years actually. And in that time we have established strong stable partnerships with some of the best contractors in the industry. This project will be handled by one of those awesome professionals as well insuring promptly delivered awesomeness so that you can get started playing your games while the excitement is still fresh! This contractor is VERY well established in the industry having delivered in a timely fashion to high levels of quality on several very large products. Their system of manufacture is very well tested and efficient to make sure that delivery is handled swiftly. And being based in the US this means no lengthy delays in delivery, and no unexpected complications in that process.
SHIPPING
We will not accept any payment for postage through the kickstarter. So please be aware that all of the money you add to your pledge WILL be applied to a reward selection and NOT to the postage needed to cover the shipment of your rewards. I have learned the hard way several times that trying to predict the postage costs of rewards packages can very easily become a serious problem. 
You will be billed for postage during the pledge manager phase of fulfillment which will be very shortly before delivery commences. We work to keep the postage costs as low as possible and we will be certain that your rewards are securely packaged so as to avoid any damage in transit.

campaign.story:
WHO DOESN'T LOVE ORCS AND GOBLINS RIGHT? 
 Those ever present mischievous murderous little rascals and their big stupid brutish cousins go a'rampaging all over the Auld World just often enough that adventurers always have something to do and always show up in significant numbers that your heroes get a good muscle building / skill developing song worthy workout in the process. And these heroes really NEED some awesome enemies to fight right? After all what is a hero without a worthy foe? Tooooo right! NOT VERY MUCH!!
RED BOX GAMES makers of finely detailed, exquisitely designed and expertly sculpted 28 mm traditional western fantasy miniatures presents;
And here they are all gussied up and ready to smash bash and thrash fool hearty would be adventurers painted by Sebastin Picque at DEad Fish Painting with pics granted by the very generous collector who commissioned them from Seb. You can check out more of Seb's awesome body of work on facebook at https://www.facebook.com/DeadFishPainting/?ref=br_rs
  SCALE REFERENCE PICTURE!!!!
   pictured below from left to right RBG Orc, Reaper Orc ( sculpted by me as well ) and a GW Orc ( which wasn't sculpted by me but maybe might have liked to have been )
 Hey look at that!!
   With your generous support and encouragement we hope to fund the production of a boxed set of fearsome beasties fit to harrow your favorite adventuring heroes in primeval forests old and dark and shadowy dungeons dark and deep. 
    Amoungst these burly brutes and sneaky scamps you'll find;
    2 modular Orc Warriors fitted for universally interchangeable legs ( 2 ) right hands with sword or axe ( 2 ) left hands with weapon or shield ( 2 ) and helmeted heads ( 2 ) repeated TWICE for a total of  4 modular figures
    2 Modular Orc Brutes fitted for universally interchangeable legs ( 2 ) bared heads ( 2 ) and weapon options Sword or Mace ( 2 )  repeated TWICE for a total of 4 modular figures.
    2 Runty Goblin Archers cast in a single piece with short bows at the ready repeated TWICE for a total of 4 figures.
    2 Runty Goblin Spearmen cast in a single piece with crudely wicked Spears ready to puncture adventurers repeated TWICE for a total of 4 figures.
     2 Runty Goblin Warriors cast in a single piece with battered rusty swords just perfect for cleaving and cutting hapless passers by! Repeated TWICE for a total of 4 figures.
     All this in one box for the low low price of $40.00 USD! 
     We ALSO have Orcs only Horde boxes where in you will find 16 Orc bad asses just FROTHING at the maw to rend and slash, and bash and smash for the super awesome price of just $40.00 USD
     Aaaaaand cause yall asked for it!! A Goblins only horde box where in you will find 24 of the filthy little rapscallions gnawing on each other's ears and licking their blades and just generally being a writhing mass of stinking pelt bound meanness ready to be unleashed upon those picturesque little hamlets a-scatter in your storybook la-la land. Also for JUST $40.00 USD.
     See? Not much math stuff, lots of Orcs and Goblins. Who needs them book learnin talkie times anyways? Not Gobbers and Orcsies don't.
     It is our hope that as the campaign progresses we can add items to the offering and perhaps to the initial box contents as well HOWEVER as this is our first effort in plastic manufacturing we want to be sure we are responsible and take this slowly keeping everything nice and predictable and efficiently produced and delivered. So there will only be a few additions to this campaigns. We don't want to get too ahead of ourselves with promises but we also want to make sure we make the most of this campaign that we can. You CAN NOT go wrong with more and more monstrous beasties eh?

    Please be aware you can buy as many of these boxes as you want! Personally I don't think any orc or goblin warband is complete unless it nearly breaks the shelves under it's ponderous weight when stowed away between sessions of rampaging blood thirst. 
   If you want to add to your rewards you can do so by managing the amount of your pledge upward by enough to cover the addition of as many green hellions your heart desires. 
  And remember a forest without goblins under every hedge is just not a forest worth trodding through for any self respecting adventurer! And what would goblins do once they DID grab the attention of those hapless Adventuring jerks without their trusty overgrown and significantly less intelligent cousins the Orcs! Big hulking murderous brutes just FROTHING at the mouth to rip into a nice shiny suit of plate mail to get to the squishy red gooey center!!!
  HEY! Yes. YOU! You want to look TOTALLY awesome?! of course you do. ESPECIALLY when looking awesome means wearing a truly kick ass Face of the Orc God T-shirt. No stupid logo. Just an awesome Cave drawing of a screaming horned savage Beastie who strikes fear into the hearts of all who cross his path. You too can borrow a bit of that thunder. Just buy this T-shirt. Wear it proudly. When people ask you where you got that piece of awesomeness Growl! Laugh! Maybe slap yourself in the face a few times and beat your chest and say YOU are a proud contributor to the Red Box Games Hordes of the Auld World Orcs and Goblins kickstarter campaign!
  available in men's sizes S M L XL XXL XXXL XXXXL and XXXXXL
  Want one? All you need to do is add $25.00 to your pledge and you too can look totally awesome in command of your Orcses and Gobbers!
  Your characters are heroes! MIGHTY adventurers! They DESERVE awesome enemies to fight! the theatre of your imagination DESERVES fantastic minis! YOU. NEED. THE HORDES OF THE AULD WORLD ORCS AND GOBLINS BOXED SET!!
   The whole idea of this kickstarter is to fund the production of these fantastic monstrosities in high detail hard grade PVC plastic similar to many of the newly beloved board games recently hitting the market like a spiked ball of steel in the gnarly green fist of a feral Orc berserker rampaging through the ranks of silly tights wearing doods who spend all their time preening their poofy feathered hats and shining their armor and dancing with their little swishy poke " swords " and singing songs about damsels and wine and stupid stuff. Do we really want those kinds of doods in charge of stuff and ruining our good time? No. No we do not. We want Orcs and goblins. Lots of them. That is why plastic is good; cause we can make a LOT of them and sell them cheap.

  So to help us do this well we need your help to allow us to pay the high cost of plastic production with tried and true manufacturers who have produced many of these exact same great boxed game projects.
   Ok this is serious. Shipping is important and can be costly depending upon where in the world you need your stuff to be delivered to. Because we do not know exactly when the project will complete production we cannot bill for postage until the product is actually in hand and ready to deliver. We are working to build a base frame of reference for the shipping costs and we are also working to establish relationships that may allow us to ship from hubs in various parts of the world to mitigate those costs.

And Say! If you like all this snazzy artwork we have here you should check out Dave's artwork over on his facebook page https://www.facebook.com/Zhu-Industries-765057203635151
And Hey! If you want to check out our existing catalog you can follow this link here to view the Red Box Games body of work currently available! All of these figures are going to be cast in metal with the exception of just a small few of the larger pieces being cast in resin.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
My name is Tre Manor. I have been in the miniatures industry since 2006 launching my own business in 2008. I have a significant amount of experience in producing resin and metal figures having produced some 300 odd figures over the past 10 years of being in business for myself. I also have a good deal of experience running and delivering on kickstarters having run and delivered successfully on 11 of them since 2012. I DO NOT however have any experience in the production of plastic miniatures. I have never dealt directly with Chinese production firms nor handled the importation of goods from China. However I AM in contact with competent advisors on these subjects and I have contacts and quotes from reliable and proven Chinese manufacturing firms who have a proven record for delivery and professional service and exemplary quality.

All of that said there are aspects of both production and delivery that go wrong in the production of plastic miniatures and the importation there of. Delays in production, delays in shipment, delays in customs. All of these can be factors in the course of the fulfillment of the campaign as well as changes in the actual product as it goes through the process of plastic production.

We will be actively working to insure this campaign runs as smoothly as possible and that the product delivered is a quality product.

You as a backer need to bear in mind though that by pledging your support to this campaign you are taking on a degree of risk that the end product may be different than the product shown in the campaign or that delivery may take longer than projected. We will always work to be sure you are as satisfied as we are able to but we cannot offer refunds once the funding for the campaign is secured post kickstarter. If you pledge to this campaign you are here by acknowledging that you accept that we cannot offer refunds of pledges.

campaign.story:
Although some infamous halflings had gone 'Adventuring' from time to time, and others were occasionally called away on important matters, for the most part, these small peaceful folk kept to themselves and didn't feel the need to bother others, or care much about what lay beyond their own doorstep.
However, as far as anyone could remember, the halflings had never ventured beyond the large hill at the end of their valley.  They had been curious of course, and there was much speculation as to what was on the other side, but as the hill had been inhabited by Gnomes who didn't take kindly to such impudent questions, the matter was largely left alone.
Now, seemingly in the middle of the night, the gnomes have disappeared, and the big question (apart from where have all the gnomes gone) of what lies on the other side of the hill is now very much the talk of the town.  Some think it might be an orchard, full of apples.  Others, that a very big dragon has eaten all the gnomes and may well be coming for them next.
The Halfling Town Council declared an emergency meeting, and decided there's only one way to be sure - an adventure.  Under such dire circumstances, they are seeking brave (or at least moderately confident) adventurers, from different backgrounds to form a Party (the very worst kind, without cake or even paper hats) to investigate the other side of the hill...
Ninjas in the Pantry - Stretch Goal Unlocked!
We are very pleased to announce that we have made our stretch goal to unlock the Halfling Ninja class!  Once again, we are indebted to you for your fantastic support.
While we don't have a second stretch-goal planned, in order to keep the Kickstarter manageable, should we pas £10,000 we will endevour to come up with a mystery reward for backers of the full pledge.
The Way of the Mini-Ninja! - Stretch Goal Announced
So far, the Halfling Town Council had interviewed a motley collection of individuals from all walks of life and professions.  It had been decided however, that eager though the bakers were, they were far too vital to the town to risk, and that something else was needed. At that moment, from out of the shadows of the room, two totally silent black-clad figures triple back-flipped into the interview chairs.
"And you are..."
As suggested by one of our loyal customers, we present a male and female halfling ninja from one of the more obscure character classes. 
Should we reach £7000, then we will include one of each miniature free with every Halfling Lady and Gentlemen Adventurers pledge, and the appropriate one free with each Ladies or Gentlemen Adventurers pledge.  Backers who pledge for a single or double miniature set will be able to choose one of these miniatures as one of their options.
Midlam Miniatures are pleased to present a collection of sixteen 28mm scale halfling miniatures for use in all of your fantasy games.
Choosing Your Class
We have chosen a range of different character classes for the 'A Class of Their Own' Kickstarter, which we hope will help flesh out your fantasy adventures. However, while we couldn't include all the possible choices in the campaign, we will consider any suggestions for a follow up Kickstarter in the future, should this Kickstarter is successful.  Please leave any suggestions (from the obvious to the obscure) in the comments page!
About Midlam Miniatures and Our Kickstarters 
This is our ninth Kickstarter, and we are using it to help develop and extend our range of miniatures, in this case, halflings! 
We have been very grateful to all the support we have received in the past and hope you will join us on our latest project. Our eight previous Kickstarters - Wizard Apprentices, Wizard Halflings, Cultists of the Kraken Lord, Servants of the Undead Pharaoh, Halfling Adventures, Winter Adventurers, Common or Garden Gnomes and the Ghosts of Midlam Manor have all successfully funded.
A Note on Metal
The miniatures are cast in a high quality pewter, with a high Tin content, but may contain a small quantity of lead. We unfortunately cannot guarantee lead free models. Most 'lead free' metal usually contains a small amount of lead to help the metal flow into the mould. 
Anticipated Delivery Date
The delivery date of July 2018, is our shipping date, rather than an arrival date. As we ship all over the world, delivery times will vary considerably, even within the same countries. From our experience, the majority of deliveries take as little as a couple of days (UK), to a couple of weeks (international) although we have found a minority of deliveries can take up to (and in rare cases more than) a month to arrive. We ask you to please be patient as it is our experience that almost all deliveries do arrive safely at their destination. 
 All images and miniatures are ©2018 Midlam Miniatures.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Risks are low, though there is always a small chance that, for one reason or another, a figure does not cast properly.

In these unlikely circumstances we would either get a replacement mould or commission a sculpt by the original sculptor, matching the original as closely as possible, with whatever modifications are necessary for the miniatures to cast correctly.

Should this happen, the estimated release date of July 2018 for all miniatures could be pushed back by a month or two until any problem was fixed. Although, across all eight of our Kickstarters, we have only had one serious issue with a miniature, which in the end, only added a couple of weeks to shipping.

We strive to keep people updated at all stages of production to let them know how the manufacturing is going.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
As the full moons rise over the small town, whispers of smoke from dying fires drift from the chimney pots into the night, and all is silent, but for some contented post second-supper snoring. 
But then the night is pierced by a terrible wailing howl, and hands clutch bed clothes tighter and pull sleeping caps down over ears.
There are mutters of regret over eating the last of the cheese before bed time, but alas, this is no nightmare!

The tide had turned in the war against the rats of the gnomish hill, when Sir Duncan and Lady Matilda joined the fray.  Tooth and claw could not penetrate armour and shield, and the sharpest of steel found easy purchase on the rodent menace.  Finally, the rats, sensing that all was lost, fled in a seething mass of furry bodies.
The halfling adventurers, picking themselves up, and carrying the wounded, made their way back to the town, only to find the streets deserted, as it was lunch time.  But later, there would be a great feasting and celebration at the defeat of the Giant Rats, and a sigh of relief that the rats had been thwarted before they had begun to infest their town.

US and Russian Mechs

Hello Kickstarter Patrons,
We at Impulse Miniatures are looking to kick start our first miniature game "The Evolved".  This 28mm mech focused game gives you control over mechs, infantry vehicles and The Evolved.  The game play is fast paced, full of tactics, and strategy.  The setting is based in the modern day with some futuristic advancements.  Players can look to see modern day weapons and vehicle designs.  The story is something new that we believe players will find fresh and intense, and we can’t wait to share it with you.
After the Kickstarter we will continue to produce models for the 3 armies and have another army in the works. There are several additional units currently planned for each army.  The US army has an infantry team with large caliber sniper rifle, anti tank gun team, and anti infantry gun team. For US mechs, an anti infantry mech, a leader only mech, and a close quarters mech with pile driver.  For the Russians, a heavy cannon team, RPG team, and mortar team.  For the Russian mechs, a riot shield and shotgun armed mech, leader mech, and one armed with high explosive rockets.  The evolved will gain a heavy armored infantry unit, an infantry unit with ranged weapon, a faster moving large creature, and one with ranged.  These will be added as additional stretch goals if the kickstarter reaches all of the current stretch goals.  All of the current stretch goals and the ones mentioned above are in the rule book, and will be included in the pdf rules sent to all backers.  A printed rule book will be available shortly after the kickstarter as well.  
The evolved are humans that have the ability to control nanite swarms.  After being experimented on by scientists from the US, they broke free.  In their wake they left cities in ruins.  They lead armies of humans that  have been taken over by the nanites.  The nanites change the humans from the inside out.  The evolved brutes are formed from the melding of nanites with larger beasts and in other cases several human hosts.  They are the wrecking balls of the evolved armies.  The evolved have also learned how to use nanites to take control of mechs whose pilots have been killed but are otherwise still operable.  They are less accurate and agile, but provide  needed ranged attacks to the evolved armies.  The evolved army is a swarm army with powerful technomancers able to deal damage and heal thanks to their nanite abilities.  
So far we have the US, and Russian Mechs completed and ready for production. This Kickstarter will be funding the infantry and expansions. This is just the beginning of The Evolved universe with many more units and models planned for the future!  Our manufacturer is US based and used by many other companies with a proven track record.  
Thank you for being apart of our Kickstarter and helping us to bring The Evolved to life.

campaign.story:
The Sauracens are a new line of 28mm white metal table top gaming figurines from RBJ Game Company.  Digitally rendered by Master Sculptor Tim Hill and faithfully brought to physical reality by Fortress Figures using cutting edge technology to bring you the unquestionably highest quality metal miniature available today.    
The Sauracens fled the extinction wrought by the planetary cataclysm of their home world in the forgotten epoch shrouded by the mists of eons past. Civilization for Sauracens has risen to celestial heights and fallen to their archaic origins many times as their knowledge ebbs and flows as with the cycles of the great celestial mechanism. Those retaining knowledge of archaic technologies still travel the stars searching for the mythical home of their origin to which they are instinctively as a species driven to return. As the navigator/priests identify each newly discovered planet, they pray to the celestial consciences that the long lost home of their origin will finally be rediscovered and bring some peace to the wander lust they have not yet managed to suppress.
METALS
 This project is for unpainted, white metal figurines. Models are provided NOT painted. Models are scaled to 28mm toe to eye or 1:60. Models are provided with a plastic tab/slot base. White metal figurines are not toys and are intended only for adults. Models may require some assembly, may have sharp or pointed parts and are a choking hazard to anyone prone to put them in their mouth.
SCALE COMPARISON
  PLEDGE LEVELS
  GRENADIER SQUAD
  SAURACEN RAIDERS
  STRETCH GOALS
  $1500 STRETCH GOAL
  WHATS NEXT
  ADD ONS
  SET ADD ONS
  SHIPPING
On the end of the campaign, each backer will be issued a coupon code via e-mail to redeem at our on-line store for your pledge rewards. This worked out very well last time around seeming to be the simplest way and also allows for some last minute additions if you desire. Shipping fees are not included in the pledge level and will be collected at the time you redeem your coupon code.
Estimated shipping fees:
U.S. $0 - $5 (U.S. receives free shipping for $50 or more pledges)
Canada $0-$15 (Canada receives free shipping for $125 or more pledges)
World Wide $0-20 (Free world wide shipping for $175 or more pledges)
Customs fees, duties, taxes, tariffs and or additional charges incurred at the shipping destination by the receiver are the responsibility of the receiver. RBJ Game company cannot accept any responsibility for additional charges imposed by the taxing authority of the legal jurisdiction of the receiving residency.
WHY KICKSTARTER?
 Kickstarter has proven to be the best method to launch and expand a new range of miniatures. Kickstarter has enabled a renascence in miniatures by allowing manufacturers to appeal directly to their fan base. With the success of our Kickstarters, we were able to have several more figures sculpted, printed and put into production than we initially planned. The funding level directly affects the expansion of the range with our backers literally funding our efforts with their venture capital. What better way to participate in creating the miniatures you want while supporting the hobby we love?
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There is practically no chance of this project not being fulfilled once the successful funding level is reached. Fortress Figures is one of the oldest professional miniatures production companies with more than three decades of experience casting the finest white metal miniatures with capabilities for casting several thousand figures per day. All molding and casting is done in house by our dedicated staff of three well experienced individuals. Only the sculpting is outsourced and the sculpting portion of the project is already completed. We have again, allowed ourselves what we consider to be an extraordinarily abundant amount of time to complete this project. We have, so far, completed 5 Kickstarter projects and a 6th project on track for completion before the end of this campaign. A quick look at our previous Kickstarters will show that we shipped rewards to backers well ahead of schedule. We believe we have a 100% backer satisfaction record after five successful kickstarters and a 6th one in process. We're not perfect but if a problem does arise we do our honest best to resolve any issues.

An unforeseen event, though unlikely, could be, well, unforeseen. Should anything go awry, I pledge to keep our backers up to date on any delays or scheduling changes that might occur.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Hello Again Kickstarter backers new and loyal, longtime supporters and fans of Red Box games! We have returned again to kickstarter in the hopes to fund our newest selection of fantasy norse figures that we call the Njorn. 
  Our intention is to fund the production of a new set of heroes and their faithful follower rank and file troops. We also intend to fund the set up of our in house production capacity! This means buying a spin caster, a smelter, all the various periphery of safe casting, metal shelves to hold molds ( LOTS of molds ) having our molds shipped to us from the various contractors we currently partner with, and raw metal to do the casting with. Being set up for in house production will allow us to reinvest in the various aspects that will make your experience with Red Box Games more efficient and better presented, as well as allow us to manage our working capital MUCH more efficiently.
  We currently reinvest a disproportionate amount of our profits into maintaining reasonable stock levels across the entire breadth of the red box games line. This is a HUGE investment that grows every time we add new products to the line. It also means we have to rely on kickstarters much more because we simply cannot afford to just put new items in to the store without knowing that the funds are already there to pay for the production and stocking of said items.

  Once set up for casting we will be able to keep the funds of the business' success where it belongs, in the future of the business. It also has the added advantage of allowing us to afford lower prices across the board and able to take chances on items which are too risky to produce through out sourcing such as larger monsters and cavalry and Rank and File sets appropriately priced for army building. 

  To insure that the high level of quality you have come to expect from Red Box Games is faithfully maintained, I will be training in casting with a VERY talented and experienced mold maker and caster. I wont be handling the entire burden of casting right away so there is no need to worry that this development will slow down delivery of the Kickstarter or the regular course of business for RBG.

  My molds will continue to be made by one of the industry's best studios as well so there is no need to worry that the burden will overwhelm me or that the overall quality of the Red Box Games product will suffer.

  I cannot do any of this without your help so please consider backing this kickstarter! You will get some really cool stuff for a GREAT price in a reasonable amount of time and I will FINALLY be able to set up for my own production and make some real progress in this industry!

  AAAaaannndddd without further Adieu...... ON TO THE MINIATURES!!!
 We intend to fund as many figures as this kickstarter will allow and at the outset of the campaign we have 19 figures ready to go with a few slight details needing to be added before they are ready for production and I still have several more underway which will be shown as they are completed and added to the campaign as the funding allows. 
   Please se as follows for the full selection of miniatures offered in this campaign;
  KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE!! Thorarnr the Storm Hammer!!
  available as a free addition to all pledges of Warband or Alla Njorngarna but available as a selection option or $8 add-on as well!
       Any of the miniatures shown above can be selected as singular selections. or the entire group can be selected. 
 Backers can pledge for an entire warband ( 25 figures in total as of the launch of the campaign ) cast in high quality white metal, or pick and choose individual figures from the selection funded by this campaign.
HERO ..................This pledge level rewards backers with 1 copy of any one of the figures successfully funded through this campaign cast in high quality white metal.
COUNCIL....... This pledge rewards backers with their choice of any 10 figures funded through this kickstarter campaign.
WAR BAND ..............This pledge rewards backers with their choice of any 25 figures funded through this campaign.
ALLA NJORNGARNA........This pledge rewards backers with one copy of each of the figures funded through this campaign AND one copy of each of the figures currently offered in the red Box Games Njorn back catalogue, including also a few of the recently OOP models as well. 
      All figures will be produced in high quality lead free white metal.
    Most figures will be cast in a single piece. However some figures may need to be cast in multiple parts to allow for the most reliable casting. These figures will also be cast in high quality lead free white metal as well.
 All packages will be shipped in BOXES rather than envelopes with any appropriate extra packaging needed to insure your rewards are delivered perfectly intact. It is my hope to also be able to invest in some fancy schmancy marketing materials and snazzy packaging to go in with your beautiful Red Box games minis.
All packages will be fullfilled from the United States. Postage will be collected within the kickstarter pledge. However it is not always possible to predict when / if postage costs increase to deliver to foreign countries. As a result we must reserve the right to bill for any additional postage needed to cover the shipment of your rewards. We do not try to profit from the postage of our packages and will always keep the cost of delivery exactly in line with the actual costs.
 For those who are unfamiliar with me as a sculptor and with my business red box games I am a sculptor of finely detailed 28mm scale fantasy miniatures. Most often specializing in minis of a Norse theme. I founded my business in 2008 and have been producing miniatures ever since. In that time I have produced some 300 odd figures for my various ranges of Men, Elves, Dwarves, Goblins, Halflings, Orcs, Demons, and Undead of all kind of role for each of those range themes. I have now run 7 kickstarters and have fully delivered on 7. I always strive to produce figures of the highest possible quality and have gone to great lengths to see to it that I deliver fully on all of my promises.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I have a great deal of experience in running and managing kickstarter projects and in the production of metal miniatures. I have run and successfully delivered on several kickstarter projects. the risks in metal production are minimal and challenges are easily surmountable. Risks include needing to outsource to different manufacturer in the event of schedule conflicts or unavailability but there are SEVERAL metal casters from which to choose in North America. The challenges might include being above to deliver successfully in the expected frame of time. I have had difficulties in this area in the past but I ALWAYS deliver on my promises.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Kickstarter has proven to be the best method to launch and expand a new range of miniatures. Kickstarter has enabled a renascence in miniatures by allowing manufacturers to appeal directly to their fan base. With the success of our last Kickstarter at more than double the funding level, we were able to have several more figures sculpted, printed and put into production than we initially planned. campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There is practically no chance of this project not being fulfilled once the successful funding level is reached. Fortress Figures is one of the oldest professional miniatures production companies with more than three decades of experience casting the finest white metal miniatures and capabilities for casting several thousand figures per day. All molding and casting is done in house by our dedicated staff of three well experienced individuals. Only the sculpting is outsourced and the sculpting portion of the project is already completed. We have again, allowed ourselves what we consider to be an extraordinarily abundant amount of time to complete this project. We have, so far, completed 5 Kickstarter projects. A quick look at our previous Kickstarters will show that we shipped rewards to backers well ahead of schedule. We believe we have a 100% backer satisfaction record after five successful kickstarters. We're not perfect but if a problem does arise we do our honest best to resolve any issues.

An unforeseen event, though unlikely, could be, well, unforeseen. Should anything go awry, I pledge to keep our backers up to date on any delays or scheduling changes that might occur.

updates.update_content:
If any of you are interested in some skeletons to go with your skulls and bones, we have a second skeleton project up right now and already funded with the first stretch goal met.  These are great single part models for those of you not so keen on assembly. 
Skeletons Two

We have one pledge turned in yesterday that should go out tomorrow.  Every other pledge that has been received is either delivered or shipped.  I'm going to declare this Kickstarter project successfully concluded.  Thank you all for participating and watch for our next project.  We have some really cool Ancient Greek and Amazon themed figures up next.

All orders we have received as of today, are packed up and ready to ship.  They will be in the hands of the Post Office Friday March 16.  Anyone who has not yet redeemed your coupon should do so at your earliest convenience.  We are ready to ship your product.  If you are having trouble or don't understand how to do this, just send us a PM and we'll take care of you.

We have the first 40 boxes done and ready to ship. There has been around 50 of you turn in your orders so far so I would expect to start shipping these out next week. The Post Office loves to see us coming!!!

We've started casting piles of skulls and and bones.  I'm pleased to report that everything has been molded and is currently in production.  
Here are a few photos I've taken when I think to do it.  I need to try and remember to take more pictures as work progresses.   The B&W images are easier to see in the bad light of the production shop.   
This is the freshly parted mold for the tombstones.  There are no gates or vents cut into this one yet.  The dark tombstones here are the master castings that were used to form the mold.

We've started sending out coupon codes so you can begin placing your orders.  Basically, you just need to enter the code when you check out of the store so we can make sure you get your pledge rewards.  You should feel free to change your pledge to anything you like.  You can pick any items your pledge amount will cover and you can add  any number of items for an additional charge.  
We will still be a week or so before we start sending out the orders.  I'm waiting on a shipment of rubber to make the new tombstones and since everyone gets one of those, we'll be held up until I get that done though I should be done with that yet this week.

Thought you might like a look at the print platform just finished.  A few of these are a bit larger than anticipated so I'll scale them back a bit and try again.  I should have around 30 different of these and get them molded later this week.
I've been expanding the variety of the tombstone pack.  My goal is to get the pack variety up so you don't get repeats.

Our next stretch goal will be the dancing skeleton.  Poor Trevor John died snorting coke at a nightclub in '77. He couldn't stop dancin' in life and now he can't stop dancin' in the afterlife.  At $3600, all eligible pledges will receive a free pewter dancing skeleton!

campaign.story:
When my daughter was three she'd run around the house imitating an ax-kick and screaming "Ha-Yaaah!". I drew some chibi style sketches of a little warrior girl and L'il Musa was born.
Then in 2015 I met mini-sculptor Tom Mason. I had been following his work, and much to my surprise he'd been following my web comic "The Legendary Sisters of the Laughing Doggebi." Well we became instant friends and for a couple of years we discussed a collaboration.
I showed him the sketches I'd done of L'il Musa, and he immediately said he'd love to sculpt her. So I'm terrifically excited to introduce Tom's beautiful sculpture via this miniature and the warrior herself via this miniature comic!
L'il Musa and her pet Puggebi are sculpted in 28 mm heroic scale and cast in high quality pewter.

  As painted by award winning painter David Pauwels

Hello everyone! Fulfillment has begun. Domestic Black-Belt Musa have all been sent, you should have received your USPS tracking numbers tonight, if I missed anyone, please let me know.

updates.update_userinfo: I just signed 27 of these things...
updates.update_content: I finally got my shipment of books. Which means the long involved process of packaging these suckers has begun. And for twenty-seven of you that means signed books! Fortunately my hand isn't too sore.

Last night I finished black and white inks on the comic. Given things go smoothly this week and there's no major interruption I should have the .pdf version for those of you who chose a reward level that included it by Monday at the latest! Which hopefully is also when the book will be sent off to the printer.
Tonight's warm-up sketch is a quick expression of my gratitude...

Well, when I got to work and turned on my phone to end my self-imposed moratorium on constantly checking the status of the Kickstarter, I got an IM from a friend congratulating me on being fully funded. Looking at the dashboard, I see that it was backers increasing their pledges that made it happen. I can't tell you how touching that is, you wanted this to succeed, and that means a lot to me.
You should be expecting a survey in the next couple of days as funds clear. That's where I'll get your mailing addresses. Assuming everything falls into place as expected, with ordering the products, getting comics from printers, and assembling the packaging, I'm hoping to have your rewards in the mail mid to late February.

updates.update_userinfo: I can't watch! Only two hours and $225 to go.
updates.update_content: Man! This really is coming down to the wire.  After a somewhat fitful night of sleep, waking to check progress, I think I've reached the point I can look no more. So, I'm going to turn off my phone, get ready for my day job and hope for an eleventh hour miracle. But no matter what happens, I'm grateful to each and every one of you. Your support has been very encouraging. Happy New Year everyone.

For ten bucks more than the normal Black Belt level, there's a new Elevated Black Belt level. For backers at this level I will sign the mini-comic. And yes this does stack to the higher rewards, so if you already have one of the Master level reward tiers you don't have to do anything to your pledge and you'll get the signature as well.

There is practically no chance of this project not being fulfilled once the successful funding level is reached. Fortress Figures is one of the oldest professional miniatures production companies with more than three decades of experience casting the finest white metal miniatures and capabilities for casting several thousand figures per day. All molding and casting is done in house by our dedicated staff of three well experienced individuals. Only the sculpting and printing is outsourced and the sculpting portion of the project is already completed. We have again, allowed ourselves what we consider to be an extraordinarily abundant amount of time to complete this project. We have, so far, completed 4 Kickstarter projects. A quick look at our previous Kickstarters will show that we shipped rewards to backers well ahead of schedule. We believe we have a 100% backer satisfaction record after four successful kickstarters. We're not perfect but if a problem does arise we do our honest best to resolve any issues.

An unforeseen event, though unlikely, could be, well, unforeseen. Should anything go awry, I pledge to keep our backers up to date on any delays or scheduling changes that might occur.

campaign.story:
Enter the savage ruins of Relicblade. Lead the sinister Wretched Hive in a dangerous criminal underground, or find yourself entangled in the strange motives of the inscrutable Wilderkin.
The Wretched Hive Kickstarter campaign offers the opportunity to add amazing new characters to Relicblade. New Faction Sets not only present the chance to expand the game, but also offer a great entry point for new players. The Wretched Hive Kickstarter campaign promises to deliver all-new factions, characters, unit types, upgrades, and powerful magic spells. These faction sets have been meticulously designed to add exciting new play-styles to Relicblade!
Get both of the new expansions and eight incredible metal miniatures with the recommended Bold Adventurer pledge level!
 The Wretched Hive
In The Wretched Hive we delve into the sinister underworld that exists on the fringes of society.
The iguan are a ubiquitous reptilian race whose myths claim a primordial origin predating all human civilization. The pragmatic iguan do not build cities of their own, but rather opt to live in nomadic groups operating with a network of semi-permanent encampments on the outskirts of large cities. Traveling bands will meet to trade with the settled iguan, who in turn offer goods and services to the wider markets. 
Due to their peculiar psychology many iguan find full integration into civilized life distasteful and traditionally work as laborers and sailors. They never shy from dangerous work, and take special pride in their ability to endure. Despite the obvious value of strong workers, the complex cruelty of civilization has branded the iguan as the lowest class. Merchants gain hordes of wealth while the workers struggle to survive. 
In the absence of true justice, following the law is a luxury few can afford. Thus we enter the vile black markets of the Wretched Hive. Where cruelty is the law and only the strong survive. 
The slave trade is perhaps the most depraved of the black market practices. The legality of slavery may vary from kingdom to kingdom, but legal status only truly changes how public the slave auctions are. 
The Iguan Slavers are powerful fighters and bitter task masters.These depraved individuals offer harsh motivation to their comrades in brutal fashion. Slavers are rightly feared for the sinister depths of their inhumanity.
Poachers are almost universally nomadic in origin. Many ply their humble, if illegal, trade as hunters. However, in the harsh depths of the black market, not every poachable entity is a beast.
The brutal wilderness takes its toll on nomadic tribes. In the harshest seasons many poachers turn their unmatched skill as scouts and trackers to the benefit of dangerous crime lords. With highly valuable skills and keen javelins, these deadly warriors are rightly prized.
According to their customs a select few are chosen and groomed from birth to assume a terrible duty. The elder crone prepares these youth for many years. Until the fateful day they must read from the unpronounceable black pages of agog. The black pages tether the iguan to their primordial gods. As the chosen study the dizzying passages their inner minds are assailed by terrible dimensions beyond reality. 
Sadly, many are utterly consumed by madness. Those who survive are honored and assume their place as iguan witches. These witches are respected councilors and powerful sorcerers. They peer into the void to observe the threads of fate, command plagues, and call upon the boiling depths of the earth. These powerful women form an integral core of iguan political and religious society.
Nomadic iguan have formed strange alliances in their bid for survival. One such partnership is with a the mangrove basilisk. A long snouted sub-species endemic to the brackish badlands.
These cold-blooded beasts have a near super-natural hypnotic gaze and are extremely venomous. The Iguan Witches made connections with the beasts and have used them as powerful assets for generations. These pitiless creatures grant an exotic edge to an iguan fighting force. They paralyze combatants as swift warriors descend upon their ill-fated foe.
The Wilderkin
Wilderkin is a broad term describing individuals of fay ancestry. Elves, while rare, are the most common in settled society. However, the term Wilderkin is often reserved for more conspicuous outlanders.
It is generally believed that the fay realm and ours were more closely tied in ancient times. In the terrible cataclysm known as the sundering, when great empires were brought low and from which there is only a faint hope of recovery, the relationship between realms was irrevocably changed. In this new and unstable landscape the otherworldly races adapted in strange and marvelous ways. From the peculiar gnomes to the indomitable stonekin, the Wilderkin abide by their inscrutable ways.
Gnomes are largely unchanged by our changed world. Gnome interactions have always been centered on their fanatical devotion to craft. These pint-sized hobbyists have only the slightest concern for the greater world. They are even known to forget entirely the plight of our modern age! Instead they focus with razor precision on mastery of a given craft. 
Gnomes are still intimately tied to the fay realm and may even travel between worlds. Accordingly they are visitors with minor alliances to a select few. It seems their primary endeavor in our world is to explore their passions. Once a gnome fixates on a craft they are utterly obsessed. They may be captivated by anything from shoe-making to the most complex alchemical sciences.
Due to their tiny stature, gnomes rarely travel without an animal companion. They have been seen riding everything from common mountain goats to exotic creatures only imagined in the most obscure folklore.
The stonekin were elves once. In the tumultuous years when civilization collapsed a sect of mystical artisans took extreme measures to survive. In desperation they placed irreversible enchantments on their families, forever changing their bodies to lifeless stone.
With a faint hope the artisans went to work. Employing unknowably ancient secrets, once used to create marvels beyond reckoning, the artisans worked into the fading twilight of all civilization to finish their final masterpiece. The world burned, but the work was complete.
The stonekin were born. The artisans had saved their beloved people. A new race, half-elf and half-stone, arose. They were completely alive, not living statues or enchanted stone. The stonekin were reforged in the fires of a dying world, and emerged a race fit to survive in the coming dark age.
The Battleborn comfortably faces multiple combatants.
Many stonekin live peaceful lives as farmers and artisans. However the brutality of the changed world demands certain concessions. The battleborn are a reserved caste of fearless warriors. They stand as the definition of stonekin fortitude and strength. The stonekin battleborn are imposing giants hardened for the rigors of battle.
Summon explosive stone spires to smash your enemies.
The wild elves owe their earnest allegiance to nature and regarded the sundering as a natural shift. Embracing the chaotic heart of creation, the wild elves humbly adapted in the midst of mass extinction. They plunged themselves deeper into asceticism and immersed themselves in the changed environment. Some individuals became indistinguishable from nature itself.
The wild elf druids adopted powerful beast forms to live in brutal harmony with the wilderness, while the geomancers tap into surging rivers of energy that course through the earth. Embracing the wilderness, the geomancers enjoy a place of privilege in a chaotic world. Though they are wanderers in a savage wilderness, geomancers compose themselves in complex formalities and are utterly dedicated to the discipline of the earth. As servents of the enigmatic wilds, the geomancers often find themselves entangled in heroic endeavors.
The Wilderkin follow the serpentine paths of fate. Forever entangled in the intricate patterns of an altered world. For as the wind blows, life is chaos.
Relicblade is a fantasy skirmish miniature game. Players command heroes or monsters as they battle to claim powerful magic relics lost in the ancient world. Players only need between three and six figures per side, and games only last about a half hour. The rules are simple and easy to learn, but there is a lot of depth in the available characters and upgrades.
Enjoy an immersive hobby experience as you collect, build, and paint your miniatures. Relicblade models are made of white metal for wonderful crisp detail. Games take place on a two foot by two foot area, so creating detailed scenery is very manageable. While beautifully modeled terrain is a delight, you can play on any surface you have available by simply using stacks of books to represent the troubled wilds of Relicblade.
Dive into delightful tactical depths with each new game. Specialize your characters utilizing a vast arsenal of upgrade cards. Tactics, items, weapons, potions, and spells create a wonderful framework to customize each character in your war party. Faction sets include a booster pack of cards with new characters and upgrades, so as each new set is released the options continue to grow with dynamic new list-building options. In the example below this Iguan Slaver has a combination of defensive and ranged attack upgrades, which shifts his battlefield role and greatly increases his survivability. This particular build includes cards from The Wretched Hive, The Lone Guard, and Core Game Deck.
Cards from the new sets will be in full-color for your viewing pleasure!
For players interested in narrative campaign play, the Seeker's Handbook is packed with great content. Rather than simply selecting characters and upgrades based on a point total, you will construct a base and lead your characters as they undertake dangerous adventures to claim magical treasures. There are six scenarios, four environments, dangerous wild monsters, and rare treasures that pack each game with new dangers and unique challenges. The Seeker's Handbook is a wonderful source for limitless adventure. 
Battle Pigs personally congratulate the rangers on finding the lost relic!
You can learn a lot more about the game and how it's played on YouTube! There are gameplay overviews, unboxings, and battle reports ready to be consumed! Ash and Owen of Guerrilla Miniature Games and Gaming With The Cooler played a full Relicblade campaign on their channels. So check it out!
Choose the pledge level that's right for you. Remember, by backing Relicblade you're helping it exist! Get ahold of this delightfully unique miniature game. Relicblade is 100% natural, pure, and unfiltered imagination that is bottled at the source. It is untouched by the sanitizing influence of a board-room or stock-holders. Enjoy the benefits of live and active gaming cultures.
If you're new to Relicblade the "Champion of Adventure" is AWESOME! At this mega-rad pledge level you'll get the core game along with the "Wilderkin" and "The Wretched Hive" expansions. This pledge level includes twenty one metal miniatures, the rulebook, tokens, dice, and 70+ unique cards including all kinds of amazing characters, magic swords, advanced battle tactics, and powerful ancient relics from time immemorial.
 What's a Custom Character Card?
Imagine the possibilities.
You tell me about a D&D character you used to play or any character you can imagine. Then I will do an original illustration of that character. But the fun won't stop there! I will also stick that character in a special COLOR character card and make up some sweet rules and stats for your them! The custom card will be your ideas collaboratively realized in Relicblade. You're welcome to create heroes, villains, relics, or monsters, whatever your heart desires.
You get the original illustration and copies of your character card along with the other Legends from this campaign. All ten custom character commissions will be collected in the "Legends 2" booster pack. This booster pack will be an official expansion for Relicblade for players to collect and enjoy. The first Legends set was extremely popular, so don't miss out on being part of a new generation of legends!
It is my earnest hope to raise enough money to produce the two faction sets above. But within the production timeline for this project I am happy to add a little wish-list in the form of stretch goals.
Stretch goals are a great way to boost the project outcomes as the budget increases. If we raise enough money to produce the new sets, then the money we continue to raise will push toward even more new content! Newly unlocked content will be available as Add-Ons once the goal is reached.
Guest Artist: DARKWIZARD BERSERKER
The Relicblade: Guest Artist Series RETURNS!! I'm beyond excited to offer another off the wall collaboration. As the creator of Relicblade I enjoy unbridled creative freedom. This privilege is granted by my generous Kickstarter Backers, so in this campaign I hope to extend the mantle of creative power to a deserving guest artist!
Triptych by Darkwizard
Scott Wygmans is known under the name Darkwizard_Berserker on Instagram. I almost feel like that's enough to get him the job, but he deserves it for more than a badass Fighting Fantasy name. His style is both absolutely brutal and undeniably fun. He's got one foot firmly planted in heavy metal dungeon badassery and the other cheerfully placed in a fun-loving world of adventure. It's precisely this balance of light hearted savagery that makes Scott the perfect fit for Relicblade.
I particularly love collaborating with artists with loads of style. Scott manages to evoke hardcore nostalgia of classic pen and paper gaming while always delivering something completely fresh. I encourage you to dig deep into his portfolio and let your imagination reel. It's going to be a special delight to sculpt based on his work. Let's make this happen!
This is a gross wizard.
NOTE: The Shadow Fox and Gnome Alchemist are separate characters who form a cavalry pair. Now with the Ibex and Battlesmith you'll be able to swap riders and mounts to explore new combinations. As more cavalry models are released there will be more fun options to explore. 
Fate of The Firstborn
        "The First Born King once ruled a mighty empire. His fertile lands stretched far and wide from his island borne ziggurat. His armies marched and his navy sailed, bringing tribute from the conquered. His sorcerers and alchemists sought and distilled the secrets of life. His seers and soothsayers predicted the rise and fall of mighty kings, dynasties, and empires. But for all his power and knowledge, The First Born King could not save his own.
The Firstborn still skulk in their hidden tombs and foul fens to this day, silent guardians of the treasures of their ancient empire. Animated by foul magics, they have remained strong and aware despite the loss of their primitive humanity.
Now, bold adventurers and dastardly villains scour The Fens of The Firstborn in search of ancient treasure and powerful relics. From the be-swamped port city of Fen’s Moore, they set out into the murky frontier to find their fate and fortune.
Join them if you dare, but know that wherever you go, The Firstborn will be waiting."
Fate of The Firstborn is an all new expansion for Relicblade!

Link your games into an ongoing narrative, claim rare treasures, and assail terrible monsters on your quest to claim the mighty RELICBLADE! You and a friend will be equipped to play a full campaign with this book and the Bold Adventurer pledge level.
NOTE: All the non-stretch goal add-ons are presently available at Relicblade.com. So if you're excited about trying the game you should place an order to get shipped to you right away! campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
In 2016 I ran two successful Kickstarter campaigns to create Relicblade and several expansions. It has been a truly amazing experience. Thanks to the support of backers from around the world I was able to create an extremely high quality product and even continue to run a fruitful business!

I take special care to finish as much as possible before coming to Kickstarter. I lean on my experience to set out a reasonable production schedule to deliver on time. The figures are sculpted and production is under-way. The cards are ready to send to the printer, but without the Kickstarter funds I can't afford to hit "go".

Delays are always possible. 3D printers may break, governments may topple, and trains may derail, but I am confident that I can deliver this product in good order.

Thank you for your continued support!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
